Name: The Last King's Archer
About the game: THE LAST KING'S ACHER Protect the King from evil creatures of a magic forest. The Gameplay Use you bow to protect the King! You have 3 main skills: Flame Frenezy An arrow that evoques flame behind it burning everything in the way. Thunder God Kill everyone on screen with this god-like thunder arrow. A lot of Globins to Kill - Thunder and Flame skills. You choose! - Upgrade your skills to survive and get more points. - Beautiful pixel graphics with carefully hand-drawn backgrounds; - Captivating and strange creatures born from this unique mysterious world. - The controls are simple and accessible, but with several layers of depth to master;
